document_data.name: Basil Arness
document_data.mainbody: '''Basil Arness''' was a high-ranking officer of [[Muktar]] in the [[Turmish]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Basil was a member of the [[Champions of Muktar]]. He liked befriending his victims before killing them.
document_data.History:
In [[1358 DR]], Basil and his fellow Champions arranged a trap inside [[Fort Blood]] planned by the self-styled king of [[Muktar]], [[Yrkhetep|Hetep]], to eliminate an adventuring party well-known in [[Golconda]].

Later, he took part in the [[Battle of Wilma Pass]].
document_data.Personality: Basil enjoyed killed supposed "friends", believing this made the killing more poignant.
